newsitem.title: USA: AT&T names Caterpillar chairman to board.
newsitem.headline: AT&T names Caterpillar chairman to board.

text.p: AT&T Corp on Monday said it named Donald Fites, Caterpillar Inc's chairman and chief executive, to its board of directors.
The appointment of Fites increased the number of members on AT&T's board to 11.
